All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AlertDialog
Provides methods for displaying various alert dialogs.
Appointment
The Appointment class represents an appointment for a customer in the scheduling system.
AppointmentDAO
Handles data access operations for appointment data.
Appointments
The Appointments controller class for the Appointments view.
Contact
The Contact class represents a contact in the scheduling system.
ContactDAO
Handles data access operations for contact data.
Country
The Country class represents a country.
CountryDAO
Handles data access operations for country data.
Customer
Represents a customer with various personal and contact details.
CustomerDAO
Handles data access operations for customer data.
Customers
The Customers controller class for the Customers view.
Division
Represents a division with an ID, name, and associated country ID.
DivisionDAO
Handles data access operations for division data.
Global
 
JDBC
This class uses JDBC to manage the database connection for the scheduling application.
LocalizationService
Manages translations and locale-specific settings for the application
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the scheduling application.
Report
Represents a report with an ID, name, and description.
ReportDAO
Handles data access operations for reporting purposes.
Reports
Controls the Reports view, managing the display and inputs for various report types.
SceneSwap
The SceneSwap class is a utility class with a single method that swaps the current scene of a JavaFX application to a new FXML file.
User
The User class represents a records in the Users table.
UserDAO
Handles data access operations for user data.
UserLogin
The UserLogin controller class for the UserLogin view.
